title: Move Inactivity Dashboard CSV export button into page header

requirements.summary: Relocate the "Download CSV" button on the manager Inactivity Dashboard to the page header (aligned right) while preserving visibility conditions and existing CSV content/filename behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Inactivity Dashboard page, when there are 1+ inactive operators, a "Download CSV" button appears in the page header area (near the page title) aligned right.
The "Inactive Operators" card header no longer contains the "Download CSV" button.
When there are 0 inactive operators, the "Download CSV" button is not shown anywhere on the page.
Clicking "Download CSV" downloads a CSV with the same columns and filename format as before (Principal, Last Activity, Days Inactive; filename includes the days threshold and current date).
No changes are made to backend APIs or CSV generation logic beyond the UI relocation.

file_operations.description: Move the existing conditional "Download CSV" Button from the "Inactive Operators" CardHeader into the page header row next to the "Inactivity Dashboard" title/description, aligned to the right via layout classes; keep the same click handler, CSV content mapping, and filename format, and ensure the button remains hidden when inactiveOperators.length === 0. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
